properties.name: FileName
properties.description: Name of the file that the recorded action was applied to.

properties.name: MachineGroup
properties.description: Machine-group used by role-based access control, to determine access to the machine.

properties.name: MalwareDetectionMethod
properties.description: Method used to detect malware in the email: Antimalware engine, File reputation, ATP Safe Attachments.

properties.name: MalwareFilterVerdict
properties.description: Verdict of the email filtering stack on whether the email contains malware: Malware, Not malware.

properties.name: NetworkMessageId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the email, generated by Office 365.

properties.name: RecipientEmailAddress
properties.description: Email address of the recipient, or email address of the recipient after distribution list expansion.

properties.name: RecipientObjectId
properties.description: Email recipient unique identifier in Azure AD.

properties.name: SHA256
properties.description: SHA-256 of the file that the recorded action was applied to.

properties.name: SenderFromAddress
properties.description: Sender email address in the FROM header, which is visible to email recipients on their email clients.

properties.name: TimeGenerated
properties.description: Date and time (UTC) when the record was generated.

properties.name: Timestamp
properties.description: Date and time (UTC) when the record was generated.
